title: PBE Account Disabled
body:
Hi, as you can tell from the title i cant access my PBE Account. The email on the account is different from this one as it was from a while back and i cant remember it (the reason i made another league account). Is there anything i can do to use the PBE account again if i cant remember the email or Nickname?

Thanks for the support in advance!

replies.body: It could be that you are account is disabled because of inactive
Yah, i havent played on it in a few months. i assumed thats why it was disabled. I just wanna know how i can get is reactivated if i dont know the email or nickname, if i can at all..
your acc is deleted, you need to get a new one, sign up are back up this October

I wasn't able to locate a PBE account tied to the account you're posting from.  It's possible that you might have had an old legacy PBE account that are no longer active or tied to another account.  Hit us up through an [account recovery form](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new?ticket_form_id=72416) and our account team can see about locating it for you.

Is it actually possible to get old PBE accounts not tied to an account back? I'd always assumed that they were disabled and phased out in favour of the newer system which I can't even participate in because signups were never opened for OCE.
